keyMoments.title: Straw Hats' Desperate Escape from Shinokuni
keyMoments.description: The entire Straw Hat crew works together to flee from the spreading Shinokuni gas, coordinating their escape toward Caesar's laboratory.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's teamwork and survival skills in the face of a deadly weapon of mass destruction.

keyMoments.title: Crew Successfully Reaches Safety
keyMoments.description: All Straw Hat crew members successfully make it inside the laboratory, narrowly escaping the Shinokuni gas.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's ability to survive extreme danger through coordination and mutual support.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Declares Counterattack
keyMoments.description: With everyone safe, Luffy declares the crew is ready to begin their counterattack against Caesar Clown.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the shift from defensive retreat to offensive action, setting up the crew's assault on Caesar.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it
